qas.question: Beyonce signed a letter with who in 2015?
An important UN summit took place when?
The letter Beyonce signed focused on what issue?
What had to be set in developing funding?
When did Beyonce sign a letter for ONE Campaign?
To whom was the letter addressed?

answers.text: head of the G7 in Germany

qas.question: Who did Beyoncé sign a letter for in 2015?
Who was the letter addressed to?
What was Angela Merkel serving as in relation to the letter?

answers.text: the head of the G7 in Germany

qas.question: What did the letter want the two recipients to focus on?

context: In <a4_0>2015<a4_0/> Beyoncé signed an open letter which <a0_0><a8_0>the ONE Campaign<a8_0/><a0_0/> had been collecting signatures for; the letter was addressed to <a5_0><a9_0>Angela Merkel and Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma<a9_0/><a5_0/>, urging them to focus on <a2_0><a11_0>women<a11_0/><a2_0/> as they serve as <a10_0>the <a6_0>head of the G7 in Germany<a10_0/><a6_0/> and the AU in South Africa respectively, which will start to set the <a3_0>priorities<a3_0/> in development funding before a main UN summit in <a1_0><a7_0>September 2015<a7_0/><a1_0/> that will establish new development goals for the generation.
